article_title: Hillary Clinton Medicare Expansion Plan Could Cover 13 Million People
article_text:
Thank you for your interest in licensing Fortune content. Please find information on various licensing contacts below and choose the one that best suits your needs:

1. To license Fortune articles, excerpts, or headlines for republication in various media (including books, eBooks, film, web, newsletters, newspapers, magazines and others), please email syndication@timeinc.com.

2. To license a Fortune cover, order reprint or e-print copies of an article or cover, or license an accolade, please contact PARS International at www.timeincreprints.com.

twitter.description: A new analysis finds that Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton’s plan to expand Medicare to some younger beneficiaries could extend an additional health coverage option to 13 mil...
twitter.title: Hillary Clinton’s Medicare Expansion Plan Could Cover 13 Mill...

article_metadata.description: A new study finds says Hillary Clinton's plan to expand Medicare could extend health coverage to 13 million Americans.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Hillary Clinton’s Medicare Expansion Plan Could Cover 13 Million People
article_metadata.news_keywords: Hillary Clinton, healthcare, health insurance, Medicare, Obamacare, Bernie Sanders, single payer, senior citizens, Avalere Health
article_metadata.sailthru.description: It would give 50-to-64 year olds another insurance option.
